verses.verse: נִדְרַ֙שְׁתִּי֙ <WH1875> I am sought לְל֣וֹא <WH3808> not שָׁאָ֔לוּ <WH7592> of [them that] asked נִמְצֵ֖אתִי <WH4672> [for me] I am found לְלֹ֣א <WH3808> me not בִקְשֻׁ֑נִי <WH1245> of [them that] sought אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> I said הִנֵּ֣נִי <WH2005> behold הִנֵּ֔נִי <WH2005> behold אֶל־ <WH413> about גּ֖וֹי <WH1471> Behold me behold me unto a nation לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not קֹרָ֥א <WH7121> [that] was not called בִשְׁמִֽי׃ <WH8034> by my name

פֵּרַ֧שְׂתִּי <WH6566> I have spread out יָדַ֛י <WH3027> my hands כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> all the day אֶל־ <WH413> about עַ֣ם <WH5971> people סוֹרֵ֑ר <WH5637> unto a rebellious הַהֹלְכִים֙ <WH1980> which walketh הַדֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in a way לֹא־ <WH3808> is not ט֔וֹב <WH2896> [that was] not good אַחַ֖ר <WH310> after מַחְשְׁבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4284> their own thoughts

הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> A people הַמַּכְעִיסִ֥ים <WH3707> that provoketh me to anger אוֹתִ֛י <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> and פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> to my face תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> continually זֹֽבְחִים֙ <WH2076> that sacrificeth בַּגַּנּ֔וֹת <WH1593> in gardens וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <WH6999> and burneth incense עַל־ <WH5921> on הַלְּבֵנִֽים׃ <WH3843> upon altars of brick

הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <WH3427> Which remain בַּקְּבָרִ֔ים <WH6913> among the graves וּבַנְּצוּרִ֖ים <WH5341> in the monuments יָלִ֑ינוּ <WH3885> and lodge הָאֹֽכְלִים֙ <WH398> which eat בְּשַׂ֣ר <WH1320> flesh הַחֲזִ֔יר <WH2386> swine's [וּפְרַק כ] (וּמְרַ֥ק <WH6564> broth ק) פִּגֻּלִ֖ים <WH6292> of abominable כְּלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3627> [things is in] their vessels

הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <WH559> Which say קְרַ֣ב <WH7126> Stand אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> not תִּגַּשׁ־ <WH5066> by thyself come not near בִּ֖י כִּ֣י <WH3588> For קְדַשְׁתִּ֑יךָ <WH6942> to me for I am holier אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These עָשָׁ֣ן <WH6227> than thou These [are] a smoke בְּאַפִּ֔י <WH639> in my nose אֵ֥שׁ <WH784> a fire יֹקֶ֖דֶת <WH3344> that burneth כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> all the day

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold כְתוּבָ֖ה <WH3789> Behold [it is] written לְפָנָ֑י <WH6440> before לֹ֤א <WH3808> I will not אֶחֱשֶׂה֙ <WH2814> me I will not keep silence כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but שִׁלַּ֔מְתִּי <WH7999> but will recompense וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֖י <WH7999> even recompense עַל־ <WH5921> into חֵיקָֽם׃ <WH2436> into their bosom

עֲ֠וֹנֹתֵיכֶם <WH5771> Your iniquities וַעֲוֹנֹ֨ת <WH5771> and the iniquities אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֤ם <WH1> of your fathers יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> together אָמַ֣ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Because קִטְּרוּ֙ <WH6999> which have burned incense עַל־ <WH5921> on הֶ֣הָרִ֔ים <WH2022> upon the mountains וְעַל־ <WH5921> on הַגְּבָע֖וֹת <WH1389> me upon the hills חֵרְפ֑וּנִי <WH2778> and blasphemed וּמַדֹּתִ֧י <WH4058> therefore will I measure פְעֻלָּתָ֛ם <WH6468> work רִֽאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> their former [עַל־ כ] (אֶל־ <WH5921> and חֵיקָֽם׃ <WH413> about ק) ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יִמָּצֵ֤א <WH4672> is found הַתִּירוֹשׁ֙ <WH8492> As the new wine בָּֽאֶשְׁכּ֔וֹל <WH811> in the cluster וְאָמַר֙ <WH559> and [one] saith אַל־ <WH408> not תַּשְׁחִיתֵ֔הוּ <WH7843> Destroy כִּ֥י <WH3588> there בְרָכָ֖ה <WH1293> it not for a blessing בּ֑וֹ כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> So אֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> [is] in it so will I do לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> behalf עֲבָדַ֔י <WH5650> for my servants' לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> not הַֽשְׁחִ֥ית <WH7843> sakes that I may not destroy הַכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> all

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֤י <WH3318> And I will bring forth מִֽיַּעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> out of Jacob זֶ֔רַע <WH2233> a seed וּמִיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> and out of Judah יוֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH3423> an inheritor הָרָ֑י <WH2022> of my mountains וִירֵשׁ֣וּהָ <WH3423> shall inherit בְחִירַ֔י <WH972> and mine elect וַעֲבָדַ֖י <WH5650> it and my servants יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <WH7931> shall dwell שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> there

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become הַשָּׁרוֹן֙ <WH8289> And Sharon לִנְוֵה־ <WH5116> shall be a fold צֹ֔אן <WH6629> of flocks וְעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> and the valley עָכ֖וֹר <WH5911> of Achor לְרֵ֣בֶץ <WH7258> to lie down in בָּקָ֑ר <WH1241> a place for the herds לְעַמִּ֖י <WH5971> for my people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who דְּרָשֽׁוּנִי׃ <WH1875> that have sought

וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> who עֹזְבֵ֣י <WH5800> But ye [are] they that forsake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הַשְּׁכֵחִ֖ים <WH7911> cause to forget אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣ר <WH2022> mountain קָדְשִׁ֑י <WH6944> my holy הַֽעֹרְכִ֤ים <WH6186> that prepare לַגַּד֙ <WH1409> Fortune שֻׁלְחָ֔ן <WH7979> a table וְהַֽמְמַלְאִ֖ים <WH4390> and that furnish לַמְנִ֥י <WH4507> unto that number מִמְסָֽךְ׃ <WH4469> the drink offering

וּמָנִ֨יתִי <WH4487> Therefore will I number אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> לַחֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> you to the sword וְכֻלְּכֶם֙ <WH3605> and all לַטֶּ֣בַח <WH2874> to the slaughter תִּכְרָ֔עוּ <WH3766> and ye shall all bow down יַ֤עַן <WH3282> Because קָרָ֙אתִי֙ <WH7121> because when I called וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not עֲנִיתֶ֔ם <WH6030> ye did not answer דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> when I spake וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <WH8085> ye did not hear וַתַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> but did הָרַע֙ <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינַ֔י <WH5869> before mine eyes וּבַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not חָפַ֖צְתִּי <WH2654> [that] wherein I delighted בְּחַרְתֶּֽם׃ <WH977> and did choose פ

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold עֲבָדַ֤י ׀ <WH5650> Behold my servants יֹאכֵ֙לוּ֙ <WH398> shall eat וְאַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you תִּרְעָ֔בוּ <WH7456> but ye shall be hungry הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <WH5650> behold my servants יִשְׁתּ֖וּ <WH8354> shall drink וְאַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you תִּצְמָ֑אוּ <WH6770> but ye shall be thirsty הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <WH5650> behold my servants יִשְׂמָ֖חוּ <WH8055> shall rejoice וְאַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you תֵּבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <WH954> but ye shall be ashamed

הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <WH5650> Behold my servants יָרֹ֖נּוּ <WH7442> shall sing מִטּ֣וּב <WH2898> for joy לֵ֑ב <WH3820> of heart וְאַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> you תִּצְעֲקוּ֙ <WH6817> but ye shall cry מִכְּאֵ֣ב <WH3511> for sorrow לֵ֔ב <WH3820> of heart וּמִשֵּׁ֥בֶר <WH7667> for vexation ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> of spirit תְּיֵלִֽילוּ׃ <WH3213> and shall howl

וְהִנַּחְתֶּ֨ם <WH3240> And ye shall leave שִׁמְכֶ֤ם <WH8034> your name לִשְׁבוּעָה֙ <WH7621> for a curse לִבְחִירַ֔י <WH972> unto my chosen וֶהֱמִיתְךָ֖ <WH4191> shall slay אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> for the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD וְלַעֲבָדָ֥יו <WH5650> his servants יִקְרָ֖א <WH7121> thee and call שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> by another

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> Because הַמִּתְבָּרֵ֜ךְ <WH1288> That he who blesseth בָּאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> himself in the earth יִתְבָּרֵךְ֙ <WH1288> shall bless בֵּאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> himself in the God אָמֵ֔ן <WH543> of truth וְהַנִּשְׁבָּ֣ע <WH7650> and he that sweareth בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the earth יִשָּׁבַ֖ע <WH7650> shall swear בֵּאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> by the God אָמֵ֑ן <WH543> of truth כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because נִשְׁכְּח֗וּ <WH7911> are forgotten הַצָּרוֹת֙ <WH6869> troubles הָרִ֣אשֹׁנ֔וֹת <WH7223> because the former וְכִ֥י <WH3588> and because נִסְתְּר֖וּ <WH5641> and because they are hid מֵעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> from mine eyes

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold בוֹרֵ֛א <WH1254> For behold I create שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> heavens חֲדָשִׁ֖ים <WH2319> new וָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> earth חֲדָשָׁ֑ה <WH2319> and a new וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not תִזָּכַ֙רְנָה֙ <WH2142> shall not be remembered הָרִ֣אשֹׁנ֔וֹת <WH7223> and the former וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or תַעֲלֶ֖ינָה <WH5927> nor come עַל־ <WH5921> unto לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> into mind כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but

שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <WH7797> But be ye glad וְגִ֙ילוּ֙ <WH1523> and rejoice עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> for ever עַ֔ד <WH5704> in אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> what אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I בוֹרֵ֑א <WH1254> [in that] which I create כִּי֩ <WH3588> for הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold בוֹרֵ֧א <WH1254> for behold I create אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> Jerusalem גִּילָ֖ה <WH1525> a rejoicing וְעַמָּ֥הּ <WH5971> and her people מָשֽׂוֹשׂ׃ <WH4885> a joy

וְגַלְתִּ֥י <WH1523> And I will rejoice בִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשַׂשְׂתִּ֣י <WH7797> and joy בְעַמִּ֑י <WH5971> in my people וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will no יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> shall be no more heard בָּהּ֙ ע֔וֹד <WH5750> longer ק֥וֹל <WH6963> and the voice בְּכִ֖י <WH1065> of weeping וְק֥וֹל <WH6963> in her nor the voice זְעָקָֽה׃ <WH2201> of crying

לֹא־ <WH3808> No יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become מִשָּׁ֜ם <WH8033> in it ע֗וֹד <WH5750> longer ע֤וּל <WH5764> There shall be no more thence an infant יָמִים֙ <WH3117> of days וְזָקֵ֔ן <WH2205> nor an old man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No יְמַלֵּ֖א <WH4390> that hath not filled אֶת־ <WH853> יָמָ֑יו <WH3117> his days כִּ֣י <WH3588> For הַנַּ֗עַר <WH5288> for the child בֶּן־ <WH1121> old מֵאָ֤ה <WH3967> an hundred שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> shall die וְהַ֣חוֹטֶ֔א <WH2398> but the sinner בֶּן־ <WH1121> old מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> [being] an hundred שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years יְקֻלָּֽל׃ <WH7043> shall be accursed

וּבָנ֥וּ <WH1129> And they shall build בָתִּ֖ים <WH1004> houses וְיָשָׁ֑בוּ <WH3427> and inhabit וְנָטְע֣וּ <WH5193> [them] and they shall plant כְרָמִ֔ים <WH3754> vineyards וְאָכְל֖וּ <WH398> and eat פִּרְיָֽם׃ <WH6529> the fruit

לֹ֤א <WH3808> They will not יִבְנוּ֙ <WH1129> They shall not build וְאַחֵ֣ר <WH312> and another יֵשֵׁ֔ב <WH3427> inhabit לֹ֥א <WH3808> They will not יִטְּע֖וּ <WH5193> they shall not plant וְאַחֵ֣ר <WH312> and another יֹאכֵ֑ל <WH398> eat כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For כִימֵ֤י <WH3117> for as the days הָעֵץ֙ <WH6086> of a tree יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> [are] the days עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> of my people וּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> the work יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> of their hands יְבַלּ֥וּ <WH1086> shall long enjoy בְחִירָֽי׃ <WH972> and mine elect

לֹ֤א <WH3808> They will not יִֽיגְעוּ֙ <WH3021> They shall not labour לָרִ֔יק <WH7385> in vain וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Or יֵלְד֖וּ <WH3205> nor bring forth לַבֶּהָלָ֑ה <WH928> for trouble כִּ֣י <WH3588> for זֶ֜רַע <WH2233> for they [are] the seed בְּרוּכֵ֤י <WH1288> of the blessed יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> like וְצֶאֱצָאֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6631> and their offspring אִתָּֽם׃ <WH854> for

וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> come טֶֽרֶם־ <WH2962> before יִקְרָ֖אוּ <WH7121> And it shall come to pass that before they call וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֶעֱנֶ֑ה <WH6030> I will answer ע֛וֹד <WH5750> are still הֵ֥ם <WH1992> like מְדַבְּרִ֖ים <WH1696> and while they are yet speaking וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> I will hear

זְאֵ֨ב <WH2061> The wolf וְטָלֶ֜ה <WH2924> and the lamb יִרְע֣וּ <WH7462> shall feed כְאֶחָ֗ד <WH259> together וְאַרְיֵה֙ <WH738> and the lion כַּבָּקָ֣ר <WH1241> like the bullock יֹֽאכַל־ <WH398> shall eat תֶּ֔בֶן <WH8401> straw וְנָחָ֖שׁ <WH5175> [shall be] the serpent's עָפָ֣ר <WH6083> and dust לַחְמ֑וֹ <WH3899> meat לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יָרֵ֧עוּ <WH7489> They shall not hurt וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יַשְׁחִ֛יתוּ <WH7843> nor destroy בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַ֥ר <WH2022> mountain קָדְשִׁ֖י <WH6944> in all my holy אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס
